variants.Description in input context: Deletions and the L166P point mutation in DJ-1 are mentioned in the study.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Cell viability assay (using hydrogen peroxide, MPP+, and 6-hydroxydopamine)

Material used.Description: The study used SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells to assess the effect of DJ-1 variants on cell death.

Readout description.Variant: N.D. (Transcript ID not specified in the text)
Readout description.Molecular Effect: Loss-of-function (DJ-1 variants lead to increased cell death)
Readout description.Result Description: Deletions and the L166P mutation in DJ-1 were associated with increased susceptibility to cell death induced by hydrogen peroxide, MPP+, and 6-hydroxydopamine.
